entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
